name: Cold Trust
description:
PITCH

Earth, 2056. As Humanity is dying, 4 scientists gather in an isolated polar station to try and come up with a cure to infertility. But as time passes and they cannot find a solution, tensions start to arise. Until one of them is found murdered.

The problem ? All 3 of the remaining scientists are convinced to be innocent.

OVERVIEW

Cold Trust is a narrative-driven game based on the relationships between people and the concept of trust. In this 3D game, heavily inspired by movies like The Lighthouse or The Shining and actual scientific discoveries, you will have to make impactful choices and be ready to question your ethics.

CONTROLS

ZQSD to Move (can remap)
Shift for Run
Mouse to Look
E to Interact
Tab for mindmap
X to use walkie-talkie
